column6: Richly Moisturizing and Great for Sensitive Skin
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
column14: This is so much better than the Dove Sensitive Skin formula.  It’s rich, creamy, scentless, non-irritating, and lathers well.  I have hormonal, itchy, sensitive, menopausal skin and this shower wash works the best.  If I have an eczema flare up if doesn’t sting or irritate it.  It’s cheap and comes in a huge bottle that lasts.  It’s free of parabens and sulfates.  I’ve learned as I’ve matured there is a reason for simplicity and why our grandmothers used the classics like Dove and cold cream on their skin.  They work.
